title: Breathe
description: Take 10 Deep Breaths, hold each breath for 3 seconds!

title: Imagine
description: Close your eyes for 5 minutes and envision a place where you want to be or visit.

title: Vista
description: Find the nearest window and take 2 minutes to view the beauty of the world around you.

title: Plan
description: Take 5 minutes to set a personal goal that you want to achieve this week.
